answers.answer: I also have gestational diabetes and no u dont have to have a c-section unless complicationsduring birth or not enough fluid. Im due next thursday and gonna have her vaginally. Best of luck to you.

question: This is my first pregnancy...I was diagnosed at 20 weeks so I've been sticking my finger four times a day and my numbers are always in what the dr considers normal. Do people with gestational diabetes have to get a c section?  Or only if they feel the baby is too big?
title: gestational diabetes
